attributes.action: Ban Slade's Merry Christmas Everybody Song
attributes.additional_details: When we hear Noddy Holder belt out the phrase "It's Christmas" at the end of the record it just reminds people of happier times gone by and of the rough couple of months ahead of buying things we really can't afford but will buy anyway for no reason other than everyone else will do the same thing and because we are all pressured into it by the media.
